title: New Ford Focus Concept
body: Ford unveiled a <a href="http://www.supercars.net/cars/2004@$Ford@$Focus%20Conceptg.html">new Focus concept</a> in China yesterday.  It looks pretty cool, it has 19" rims and LED lighting.  I wonder how close it will be to the actual production Focus though.  There's a couple more pics in this article: <br /><a href="http://www.wheels24.co.za/Wheels24/News/0,,1369-1372_1539268,00.html" title="sweet LEDs"><img src="http://galleries.wheels24.co.za/Cars/Ford/Focusconcept/images/21.jpg" alt="sweet LEDs" /></a>
bodyArticleHtml:
